scripts.start: yarn workspace @clamcurry/common build && yarn workspace @clamcurry/main build && concurrently "yarn workspace @clamcurry/renderer start" "yarn workspace @clamcurry/main start"
scripts.build: yarn workspace @clamcurry/common build && yarn workspace @clamcurry/main build && yarn workspace @clamcurry/renderer build
scripts.pack:mac: yarn run build && yarn workspace @clamcurry/main pack:mac
scripts.pack:win: yarn run build && yarn workspace @clamcurry/main pack:win
scripts.pack:linux: yarn run build && yarn workspace @clamcurry/main pack:linux
